title: [BUG] Unable to load when there is more than 1 model
body:
I have 2 keras model store locally, so i registerd both of them as 1 combined model. I am able to register the model into AML workspace as well as creating a endpoint by simply specifying my score.py to call both model to return one results. 
Calling it as an endpoint works perfectly fine

However for retraining purpose, i want to load the model from mdoel registery but hit multiple issue.
Model Name : Neural-model
Version: 3
run_id : xxxx
Folder path for model 1: /model/type/
Folder path for model 2: /model/classification/


**I tried:**

run_id='xxxx'
run="runs:/{}".format(run_id)
keras_model = mlflow.keras.load_model(run + "/model/type//")

Error:
MlflowException: Could not find an "MLmodel" configuration file at "/tmp/tmpv9jiqje9/model/type/"

**i tried using model URI as well:**

#model_uri='models:/Neural-model/3'
classifier_model = mlflow.keras.load_model(model_uri=model_uri,compile=False)

Error:

RestException: BAD_REQUEST: Response: {'Error': {'Code': 'UserError', 'Severity': None, 'Message': 'Model source model must be a directory containing an mlflow MLmodel.', 'MessageFormat': None, 'MessageParameters': None, 'ReferenceCode': None, 'DetailsUri': None, 'Target': None, 'Details': [], 'InnerError': None, 'DebugInfo': None, 'AdditionalInfo': None}, 'Correlation': {'operation': '481ee7c36a8d5b44a4114a4cc9de7cf3', 'request': 'f7a15b107e89454e'}, 'Environment': 'southeastasia', 'Location': 'southeastasia', 'Time': '2022-02-04T02:33:51.0933512+00:00', 'ComponentName': 'mlflow', 'error_code': 'BAD_REQUEST'}


The first method cannot find my model while the second cannot point to the model i want that is registerd.
Any idea how to overcome multiple model deployment issue?
